price: 34 Mais ce Jour-là, ce sont les croyants qui se moqueront des impies
arabic: فَٱلۡيَوۡمَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ مِنَ ٱلۡكُفَّارِ يَضۡحَكُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: fal-yawma alladhīna āmanū mina al-kufāri yaḍḥakūna
